Sentencas: Single-chamber solid oxide fuel cell (SC-SOFC) stacks with different angles between the gas flow direction and the electrode were fabricated and tested in a diluted methane-oxygen mixture.
Titulo: Effect of the angle between gas flow direction and electrode on single-chamber SOFC stacks

Sentencas: The gas tubes with separated gas vents were used for transmission of the reactant gasses.
Titulo: Effect of the angle between gas flow direction and electrode on single-chamber SOFC stacks

Sentencas: Experimental results showed that the performance of the two-cell stack at a gas flow angle () of 45 degrees was greatly enhanced compared with that at 0 and 90 degrees.
Titulo: Effect of the angle between gas flow direction and electrode on single-chamber SOFC stacks

Sentencas: At a furnace temperature of 700 degrees C and a CH4/O-2 ratio of 2, the maximum output power of the anode-first configuration was 154 mW at = 45 degrees, which was 51% higher than that obtained at = 90 degrees.
Titulo: Effect of the angle between gas flow direction and electrode on single-chamber SOFC stacks

Sentencas: Additionally, the maximum power of the anode-first stack was higher than that of the cathode-first one at = 45 degrees, which was contrary to the results obtained at = 90 degrees.
Titulo: Effect of the angle between gas flow direction and electrode on single-chamber SOFC stacks

Sentencas: The stack with an angled configuration of = 45 degrees will generate a more attractive power for portable power applications.
Titulo: Effect of the angle between gas flow direction and electrode on single-chamber SOFC stacks
